summary: This document is a chain of email correspondence from 2020-2021 between Gary Stein, a partner at Schulte Roth & Zabel LLP, and an Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding scheduling a call and a subpoena for records from the Professional Children's School (PCS) related to Jeffrey Epstein. The prosecutor is seeking records of third-party payments, donations, or sponsored scholarships from 1997-2000 connected to Epstein.

persons.name: Gary Stein
persons.role: Partner at Schulte Roth & Zabel LLP
persons.context: Attorney communicating with a federal prosecutor regarding a subpoena for records from the Professional Children's School related to Jeffrey Epstein. He is scheduling calls and coordinating the response.

persons.name: Elizabeth Sullivan
persons.context: Federal prosecutor copied on emails, involved in the investigation seeking records from the Professional Children's School related to Jeffrey Epstein's financial transactions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of a subpoena for records from the Professional Children's School regarding third-party payments, donations, or sponsored scholarships from 1997 to 2000.

connections.description: Professional correspondence regarding a legal matter; Stein is responding to a prosecutor's inquiry about records related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Stein, as a lawyer, is involved in responding to a subpoena for records related to Epstein's financial transactions with the Professional Children's School.
Sullivan, as a prosecutor, is investigating Epstein and seeking financial records from the Professional Children's School connected to him.

events.title: Prosecutor's follow-up on Epstein records
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails Gary Stein asking if the Professional Children's School has any records of third-party payments, donations, sponsored scholarships, or similar financial transactions from 1997-2000 relating to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Scheduling call about PCS records
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney requests a brief call with Gary Stein to follow up about the matter concerning the Professional Children's School records.

events.title: Call scheduled before trial
events.description: Emails discuss scheduling a call to check in as a trial is coming up soon, referencing an attached document.

events.title: Final scheduling confirmation
events.description: Final email confirms a meeting time and references a game, concluding the scheduling thread.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was investigating Jeffrey Epstein's financial transactions with the Professional Children's School (PCS).
The investigation sought records from PCS for the period 1997 to 2000 regarding third-party payments, donations, sponsored scholarships, or similar financial transactions related to Epstein.
Gary Stein, a partner at the law firm Schulte Roth & Zabel LLP, was the point of contact for the school regarding the subpoena and records request.
The email chain shows ongoing coordination in 2020-2021 between the prosecutor's office and Stein to schedule calls and obtain these records.
The context suggests the investigation into Epstein was active and seeking financial evidence years after his death.
